reviews.review_msg: Great lecturer and his passion for the field is apparent. Like many others have mentioned, this course is a little harder for a 100 level course. However, the habits you pick up from this course will set you up for further university courses especially if you want to take more WL courses.

Mark is really passionate about literature, he's very nice too and always available for help. However, despite saying his course is easy because he outlines his expectations, he isn't so clear and it's hard to tell how he wants things done  he marks pretty harshly too. Course if fairly difficult especially if you're not a good writer
